source: This gets the json schema from the data model repo and then uses that to produce a spark schema with some additional fields

import json

url = f"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Planning-Inspectorate/data-model/main/schemas/{entity_name}.schema.json"
schema = get_schema_from_url(url)

if not schema:
    mssparkutils.notebook.exit('')

mssparkutils.notebook.exit(json.dumps(convert_to_datalake_schema(schema)))
